title: Issues with Bluetooth Headset: in calls mics stop work
content:
Device: Google Pixel 4a Android: 11 Headset: Anker Soundbuds Slim

I have the pixel for 1 month, and i had no issues with it. However, since some days in calls the mic stops work. The sound output still works on the headset. Before, the headset worked fine.

I am not sure, if the issue related to the Android 11 bluetooth problems. Someone have similiar issues?
